website_summaries.verdict: This streamlined pair is a good choice if you're torn between a backseat organizer and a kick mat, but you'll have to sacrifice a few pockets to get the best of both worlds.
pros: Each organizer features a clear tablet holder, 2 mesh side pockets, and a large zippered bottom compartment that doubles as a kick mat
Waterproof fabric is easy to clean
Adjustable straps fasten securely to prevent swinging
cons: Straps might be felt by front seat passengers when pulled tight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit But I Used Magnets To Secure Bottom To The Seatback
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect size for my SUV and appear to be well made. Easy to install although I am not fond of the bottom strap that goes around the front seat for aesthetic reasons. I tucked the bottom strap into the seatback netting and ordered magnets to hold the bottom snug against the seatback instead. One magnet inside the seat netting and the other inside the bottom pocket on both lower corners. Works out great and looks neat and tidy. If you decide to do this you will need 8 magnets; 4 for each protector to achieve a snug fit and sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Great fit. Great storage. Just not exactly as practical as I thought they would be for watching movies on the tablet. We drive long distances regularly and my 5-year-old sonetimes watches movies on her tablet. I bought this thinking the tablet would mount at eye level for her. Because of the added height of her booster, the tablet ends up even with the chest. Because of the angle of the back of the seat that the organizer hangs on, the tablet angles downward. These two factors make it incredible difficult to watch anything on the tablet. However, it is a great holding pouch when the tablet is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Applesforu

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With These!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Great for organizing stuff for kids or adults. The big zipper pocket at the bottom easily stores bigger items. Water bottle holders are a BIG plus. Pretty great to have them while on a trip to hold items to keep the kids busy and books to read. Love being able to keep wipes to clean up the kid's hands, hide items from view should someone look in the windows. Straps don't cause any problems to the passengers in the seats in front.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Morgan

customer_reviews.title: good quality and has lots of pockets to put away ...
customer_reviews.text: This is elegant, good quality and has lots of pockets to put away all of the kids knick knacks, toys, books, etc. I like that it adds to the look of the back of my car and it helps me keep it organized. The price was reasonable, it arrived on time. Both the kids and I are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to install!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this kick mats! It fits well on my mini van. It protects the back seat and very useful storage. Specially baby bottle of my baby. Easy to install and easy to clean! Nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aroooyy

customer_reviews.title: Great for organization for children!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a great addition to my car organization! I have a 21 month old and a 6 week old that come with a lot of stuff—so these have been wonderful to hold bottles, sippy cups, toys, diapers, and wipes! They have helped my tornado of a back seat become more functional as well. We went on a small family getaway and my son really enjoyed being able to watch videos on the iPad during the drive. 10/10 would buy this product again! It is much sturdier and remains in place much better than the old car organizer I used to have. Totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances C.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my backseat to cover from damage in case of passengers while I’m driving for LYFT. they look great. And are perfect for what I need. Since I’m going on a road trip soon I figured this will be helpful for my backseat passenger. Worth every cent. And came here a day earlier than expected. So happy with this purchase and the company, the professionalism is there and i would buy again and/or recommend to my friends for their cars.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy K.

customer_reviews.title: Just a wonderful organizer to have for the backseat with children.
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this item. It is so convenient for my little one. She really loves it. Especially the tablet holder. I love the idea i keep it charged from the side with out damaging my cord. Just a wonderful thing to have for the backseat of any transportation, especially with children or a child. I also love the large pocket at the bottom of it. I really can fit a travel size pillow in it or a small blanket. So happy I ran across this organizer for the backseat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughters love them too
customer_reviews.text: This kick mat fits my new pickup truck perfectly. It’s got many pockets and can fit many things inside. My daughters love them too, because they can now put their iPad in there and watch videos while I drive.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Saving the leather!
customer_reviews.text: Our brand new car got a beating on day one from the salt on our kids shoes. It was 7 degrees out the day we drive it home. Immediately we were worried about the leather so I compared a few products on Amazon not knowing which to go with. I’m happy with our decision. We have not utilized the pockets yet but their definitely protecting the backs of the seats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my Lyft business because of the nice clear window to put tip reminder signs. Although the cup holders on the sides are somewhat laughable because they flop in and make the whole thing look like it's going to fall off from the weight of the water bottles. They should have either put the cul holders lower or put the strap closer as reinforcement. Customer service was very great at helping me with my issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: This product will Save your Seats from those Kid Kicks
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have them in our SUVS...takes seconds to install. Looks great, has a lot of storage pockets and wipes with a warm cloth, or in my case I use armor all wipes. Glad we purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good product, meets my needs for it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I bought it for my Chevy Sonic and it fits really well. It would probably fit most cars well, unless you have really, really big seats. The kids like the really big pocket and I like that my seat will stay clean. It was really easy to install and wipes down easily. It seems like it would be durable but I haven't had it that long so I can't say for sure. Overall, I'm very satisfied with the kick mats.
customer_reviews.author: Beloved2015

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these car seat kick guards, or should I say the kids love them ! It keeps all their junk in a contained place instead of all over the floor. The IPad Holder is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: RLB007

customer_reviews.title: Really really durable. Easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: The most of all I like its durability. Instead of those cheap Chinese stuff - this one is really good! Also I like that it has adjustable straps instead of Velcro or something else. The tablet pocket is a bit low for my kid (or my kid has a bit longer legs than supposed by mat manufacturer :) ), so I wouldn't risk putting my tablet into it. Except for this - only positive emotions from using this item!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: You WON'T be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with these multi purpose kick mats! I've read a few reviews with reference to the poor quality but I think they are perfect in quality being that they are KICK MATS. They are really easy to clean, install is very easy, loads of storage and I love love love that they put Velcro on both sides of the clear tablet pocket to make it easy to plug in head phones and chargers and have easy access to the volume/on off buttons.
customer_reviews.author: NRENAET

customer_reviews.title: Cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are so cool. I got 2 in the package and one I can put wipes or tissues in. This is going to great to use on long car rides. They have deep pockets to hold stuff and the tablet slots are nice to have. Great addition to any car.
customer_reviews.author: MommaFox

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking around on getting something that will organize my backseat and also allow room to place a tablet for my son to watch videos while going on long car rides... these fit perfectly in my car and I like how there are deep pockets and mesh pockets for drinks. We also find the extra external tissue box clip to be useful. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce F.

customer_reviews.title: these fit perfectly in our Chevy Silverado
customer_reviews.text: I bought these two months ago for the back of the Chevy Silverado. We were planning a road trip, and I wanted our teens to be comfortable, organized and neat. These worked great- kids watched their tablets and were able to keep up with their belongings, snacks, gum and hand sanitizers. I lucked out because these fit perfectly in our Chevy Silverado. Five stars for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna HendricksonTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - Fast Shipping and great seller to work with!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, however they did not quite work for my car and my kids did not want to deal with them on their seats. KIDS! :) Class A seller with fast shipping, great pricing and was super accommodating in allowing me a refund after the refund window closed. I very much appreciate sellers like this as life gets busy sometimes and it is nice to know that others understand that. A great product and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Kleinberg

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer for your car keep kids stuff in it place
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. But right now my children are in car seats so you don't get the full use of the compartments. This is probably more suited for children out of car seats. It does do double duty right now because it keeps the little one dirty sneakers off the back of my seats
customer_reviews.author: Robert Southrey

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and lots of room to keep things organized and easy to reach. Easily installed and adjustable straps help keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping things organized.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 08 Escalade and they fit perfect. The quality of the material is good and they are so easy to clean. I will most likely buy another set for my other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, great product
customer_reviews.text: My family and I go on ride trips a lot and my kids drop a lot of things or lose things in the minivan. No more! Now there is a place for everything. Finally I found a product that helps us keep our kid's stuff and to keep the car organized. It is very convenient and portable. There are plenty of pockets to hold basically everything my children need on a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: derrick chan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Very good for the car for children. I put my kids DVD players in them!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Functions well, sags a bit.
customer_reviews.text: The kick mats function well, I've read some reviews that the clips have broken, that has not been the case for me. The only thing I don't like is that the top corners tend to sag down, they are not as upright as shown in the product picture when you have started to use it and put items in it. Having an ipad in the clear holster is pretty much a no-go. It sits to low and slopes downward when the ipad is in. But it serves it's purpose, it protects the back of my seats.
customer_reviews.author: Ivar Thorolfsson

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent my kids from kicking and getting my seats dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Fit around my 2016 Tahoe without a problem. Helps prevent my kids from kicking and getting my seats dirty.
customer_reviews.author: lakersfn4lif

customer_reviews.title: This product survived my Autistic child for three weeks now!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it would not hold up due to the thin material but..... my son has not ripped or torn it yet. He shoves a 12" flat screen DVD player in the lower pocket on one and six DVD cases in the other. The tissue box holder is very tight with a full box of tissues but again it has survived him, a part time 5 year old that likes to kick and a 16 year old for three weeks. Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Randy D. Schock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Finally I had chance to put this kick mat on my car. It was easy to put on. The quality feel nice and thick. It not only a kick mat to prevent dirt, but also and put a lot of stuff in, such as shopping bag, tissue, restaurant manus, etc. when I open the package there was a little rubber smell, but after a few days the smell was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Serah A.

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: This item help us a lot to organize all the kid stuff. Everything now is in one place. The kick mat is awesome since it's easy to clean. The only thing I don't like is we can not adjust the height of the iPad cover because our kids are still seat in the car seat and it's a little down to their eyesight. Overall I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Saves my back seat
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea kick mats were a thing, but as a mom to two boys I’m so glad I found them. They keep everything organized and I love that I can slip in an iPad when we need extra entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda B

customer_reviews.title: Fits my sedan; hopefully saves my car's interior from my kids
customer_reviews.text: These fit my '13 Ford Taurus well and covers very nearly the entire seat back, which will hopefully save my car's interior from the hot mess of children. Can't speak for longevity, but I've had them for a week and they stay put. Installed pretty easily. So far, I've found the lowest zippered pouch not incredibly useful, but I imagine it'll get some use in time. We use the top pouch for small, thin books. Works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: DaniCalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Good protection but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got these because my grandson can’t seem to control himself from stepping all over the back of the front seat. They are easy to install but the strap on top that attaches around the headrest wasn’t long enough to go around both supports on a Volvo headrest. Can wrap it around one support but that makes it slightly off center. Also, the clear window pocket is just the right size to fit an iPad so my grandson can watch movies. But, not big enough to allow for the headphone plug to plug in and still fit inside the clear window.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money we spent!! The kids each have their own space for everything they wanted to bring for our trip!! Held their toys, games, and iPads!! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!! Great service!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am happy. Super easy to install and works for my purposes. I have a 4 year old and a 1 hour commute, which he makes with me, so we need organization and protection because he eats in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Anne

customer_reviews.title: Durable, keeps the seats clean
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to block my children from dragging their muddy feet across the back of the front seats. I bought these protectors to see if would hold up to their muddy, rainy feet and I was happy to see that it did. I was more pleasantly surprised by the storage capacity in these seat protectors. I was able to put drinks and small toys in the storage compartments. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is due to the clip that kind of sticks in my back when sitting so it takes some adjusting to get it to a comfortable position. Otherwise, I’m very happy to have clean seats again!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Spence

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids stuff off the car floor
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to stop my kids from leaving the shoe prints on the back of the front car seats and also to corral all the random stuff they "need" to bring in the car. These organizers are well-made and super easy to install. The top and bottom straps are adjustable so they can fit all different size seats. The pocket on the bottom is roomy and easily fits the stuff my 6 year old and 13 year old bring along. I also really appreciate the included holder for kleenex.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Durable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: My five year old helped me install these. They’re perfect for keeping the back seat organized and for keeping dirty shoes off of the back of my seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping vehicle organized
customer_reviews.text: Love how many pockets this has, helps majorly with kids and all the stuff they have in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: it's a good size, quality material
customer_reviews.text: it's a good size , quality material, and shapes good around the back of the seat. I didn't try all it's features, i.e. pockets, and such, but for protecting the back of the seat from kids' dirty boots, it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Nenad Duvnjak

customer_reviews.title: Protects seatback against kids legs...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very practical. Can fit a lot of stuff. It also protects leather from kids legs. Important in leased cars
customer_reviews.author: Maximyshka

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Got these for the back of the seats in my new Suburban.They cover the large sets well and keep the kid's feet off the seats, which was the main purpose I wanted them for. They have great storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: M.N.Wright

customer_reviews.title: Really great item! Love the compartments
customer_reviews.text: Really great item! Love the compartments! It's sturdy material, easy to install and stays in place, all in all a win! I can't wait to use it for her future ipad
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Caught this as a daily deal and the price was good. Item shipped quickly and was as advertised. Good fit and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice kick mat
customer_reviews.text: This works nicely. I would have liked to see the straps attached to the very bottom of it so that the last 3 inches are not flopping there loosely as you see in my photo but overall fits well and was easy to put on. Good quality, so I am ordering another set for the back seats of our minivan.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install! They look and work Great!
customer_reviews.text: These took only minutes to install and cover the entire back of the seats in our 2017 Explorer. Great purchase and we are very happy with the quality of these seat back covers!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: The holder also fit an ipad air comfortably (out of the case
customer_reviews.text: As described. We have a jeep grand Cherokee and it fit the seats well. The holder also fit an ipad air comfortably (out of the case.) If you have a thin case I suspect it would still fit without having to be removed. The water bottle holder is a bit small and a tight squeeze but it works. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: jaxs

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in my Honda Pilot. Our 4 year old could reach his headphones easily as could I from the passenger sear. His blanket fit nicely in the zipper pocket and the tissue holder made it easy knowing where they were instead of trying to find where the box slide to.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Riherd

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great size covering the entire seat
customer_reviews.text: Definitely easy to install by a clip. It truly covers the entire area where my son would have his feet to the chair. We are still rear facing and it’s a must since we want to try to keep dirt away from seat. Didn’t use the tissue box thing bc it’s in the way with rear facing
customer_reviews.author: __ceeceeH

customer_reviews.title: 2019 F150 Crew Cab - Protected from my kiddos
customer_reviews.text: This is one prong of a three pronged attempt to protect my back seats from the minions. Fits well and easy to install, doesn't affect the front seat seating surface at all. The biggest surprise was the included tissue holder. It holds the costco baby wipes perfectly and provides a super convenient place to put them. So far has held up fine on two "day long" family trips, you know the ones that should take 5 hours but somehow last 8+ hours... 1 and 3 yo.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for seats & useful, but
customer_reviews.text: Really like these for my car. Plenty of pockets and they protect my seats. I'm not thrilled with the way the bottom part buckles - you have to wrap it around the front seats & sometimes the strap comes out of the crack making it not so comfortable to sit on. May try buying magnets for the bottom and put one in the backseat pocket and one in the mat pocket and see if it will hold without the strap. Otherwise, great deal for 2.
customer_reviews.author: KellyC

customer_reviews.title: good quality and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, good quality and arrived on time. Does everything it said it would!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy66

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket for a camper van!
customer_reviews.text: I have a camper van and these seat protectors were just the ticket! There are plenty of pockets in which to store maps and other things when I'm in the woods and sleeping in this van. I also liked the stabilizing strap that goes around the seat back. The product was delivered on time and it was as described.
customer_reviews.author: Everett geezer

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat Back Storage for a Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: My 2 door Jeep Wrangler has very little storage space, so this works great to put one behind the passenger seat and one behind the back seat. Good quality product. I didn't need the iPad holder, but will make a place to store something with good visibility to see what's in there, like maps, etc. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Michael

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Truely protect my back seats from my children step on them with all sorts of shoe buttom.
customer_reviews.author: A. JOBI

customer_reviews.title: Mats came exactly as I expected them. I installed ...
customer_reviews.text: Mats came exactly as I expected them. I installed them in a 2016 Equinox and 2008 Vue and the fit well. You never even noticed the strap that goes around the seat when sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Breinn Buehner

customer_reviews.title: Great seat protectors
customer_reviews.text: Great seat protectors. The quality is great, love the large zip up pocket and that it holds a tablet while keeping dirty feet off the back of my seats! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Put them in my van and they are perfect! They are a little flimsy if you put a water bottle in the pocket but they will be fine for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Goofymom

customer_reviews.title: Fits an iPad 9. 7, keeps shoe marks ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits an iPad 9.7, keeps shoe marks off my leather seats. Win win
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Priddy-Hess

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully and durably made kick mats
customer_reviews.text: These kick mats are amazing. However because the way my front seat passenger leans back his seat the mats didnt work for me. I don't think I'm going to be able to even use any kick mat.
customer_reviews.author: MzzHalo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toyota Highlander & grandsons!
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my Toyota Highlander and grandsons! I had ordered other kick mats from a well known car accessory store online and they were $99 for 2 mats and not half as nice as these! I sent the others back and am VERY happy with the price and quality of these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives each of my kids a place for their things in the car
customer_reviews.text: This shipped and arrived quickly. It was easy to install, looks nice, and helps organize the things my two kiddos bring in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to keep your seats clean and have extra storage, this is perfect! Made very well, the bottom is easy to clean and there’s plenty of storage. It doesn’t hang down like others I’ve seen. It straps around the front and you can tuck the strap in front seat so it’s not a bother. Lots of storage! If you have kids, this is a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and flimsy-  zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why there are so many good reviews for this product. These are very flimsy and did not mount tight to our seats. The zipper broke immediately and they sag off the back seat. Horrible, would not purchase again or recommend. Update: The manufacturer reached out to my and refunded the cost of the product. I can't speak to if they product improved or not, but I do appreciate the good good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: mmdallas81

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the side pockets for holding their drinks
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my seat backs. Kids love the side pockets for holding their drinks. Haven't used the tablet pockets yet but I'm sure the kids will find them very convenient! The tissue holder stuck out too far for my car so it just sits in the seat... Keeps my tissues together and much nicer than a smashed up tissue box. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: J Thomas

customer_reviews.title: These were a great find! Since they came in a 2 pack ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that wouldn't be bulky, but would be strong enough to stand up to daily wear and tear from my kids. These were a great find! Since they came in a 2 pack I order a set for each car. They were easy to install. I only gave 4 stars because I am worried that the zipper on the large bottom pouch may not hold up...it seems a little delicate for young kids. Overall, I think this was a great purchase (they were packed nicely as well).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! The Back seat is Tidy, there's a place for everything.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed. They fit my cars seat back well, a Honda Crosstour. I really like the huge zippered pouch that starts from mid seat back height to bottom of seat back. Perfect to stow away a travel blanket for my 5yo nephew, or holds several magazines. The clear plastic window is perfect for rear seat passangers as it is sized to hold an iPad for viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Lovepolkadotz

customer_reviews.title: I did figure out an easy solution, I added two grommets at the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had with the kick mats was the way it secures at the bottom. I think a wraparound the seat approach is the wrong design. This method gets pinched in the seat and reduces the way the seat can be adjusted. I did figure out an easy solution, I added two grommets at the bottom and small Bungie cable to the bottom under the seat. this keeps the kick mats tight and secure to the back of the seat
customer_reviews.author: Mikelectric

customer_reviews.title: The mats are very nice, seem durable
customer_reviews.text: The mats are very nice, seem durable. The kids love them. First order came with one mat missing one of the straps. The seller contacted me and sent me a new set, no problem. Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all cars/trucks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the little ones riding in the back seat. Or even for your adult passangers. Loads of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tshaff

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and it was super easy to install. Our twins love it very much. It keeps all their stuff organized!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get a bunch of comments say what a neat idea it is
customer_reviews.author: Wildcard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Put these in the wife's jeep to keep kids mess in it and feet off the seats. Exactly for that.
customer_reviews.author: terrance

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. Easy to install and easy to use. Our two year old was giving the back of the seat of our new suv a run for its money. Now she doesn’t seem to want to kick the seat anymore due to the cover being on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kirkley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel, but clasp broke shortly after first use
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our road trip with two kiddos. However, I was disappointed that upon the second time installing the organizer, after detaching it to insert my son’s tablet, the clasp that fastens to the headrest broke and will no longer work properly. Who would I contact for a replacement? Thanks ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Held up nicely against small
customer_reviews.text: These have been great at protecting my seat backs against my young children. We will be purchasing another set for my husband’s vehicle
customer_reviews.author: KNL

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! and the seller was so sweet to follow up and ask how they were working with my car.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Vellios

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My vehicle is a traverse and the iPad holder sits perfect for my child to see. I was worried on some of the reviews they said the straps would break, but nope super sturdy my toddler was even pulling on it. I am very satisfied with the product can’t wait to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Saldivar

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a life saver! My son gets car sick but in long rides likes to watch movies on his tablet. With these he can put his headphones on put his tablet in the clear part and not have to look up and down! They go in easily and also help keep foot prints off the back of my leather seats! So glad I purchased these! Will definitely be recommending to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Wright

customer_reviews.title: ... a simple mistake with my order and they were super professional and fixed the problem to suit my needs ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a simple mistake with my order and they were super professional and fixed the problem to suit my needs and right away. Would highly recommend these kick mats. Worked perfect for my car!
customer_reviews.author: Molly McBrayer

customer_reviews.title: ... well as protecting the back of the seat from dirty things. I got these along with something for ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my extra things that end up in the car as well as protecting the back of the seat from dirty things. I got these along with something for the front of the seat as I was told not to get anything that covers the sides of the seats due to air bags. Something to keep in mind when preserving your upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hagemann

customer_reviews.title: Read package content.
customer_reviews.text: These seat covers easily fit my 2007 Jeep Commander. I thought each seat cover would come with its own iPad holder but I received only one😒 Oasser representative, Sara, contacted regarding me regarding the missing iPad holder and offered to send one (even though it could have been a mistake from Amazons fulfillment center). The car kick seat covers are perfect and customer service is fantastic 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: celia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, kleenex dispenser needs some help
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and really only have to comment on the kleenex dispenser as we are an ‘allergy family’ so this was the selling point for us. Wish there was a way to secure the bottom of that container too because it just hangs there so when trying to pull out a kleenex, it sways and tears the kleenex. Also doesn’t fit a normal size box of kleenex. Need a thinner box and can’t find good quality kleenex in the thinner box.
customer_reviews.author: laylabear

customer_reviews.title: Five stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Tacoma so the kids can some where to put their tablets and other things. Helps to keep car clean and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Love them They work perfect in my new car. The kids love them as well because I dont have to keep telling them feet off the back the the seat. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They protect the back of my seats while keeping my kids things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Krik

customer_reviews.title: I hate that you have to keep putting words in these spaces.  If I like it, I like it I dont have time to fill all this out
customer_reviews.text: I hate that you have to keep putting words in these spaces. If I like it, I like it I dont have time to fill all this out
customer_reviews.author: SD buyer

customer_reviews.title: Universal, nice and efficent.
customer_reviews.text: Super quick. Nice products. Thank you for the seat back covers with pockets. Fit my f150 and mustang. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps back of your seats cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Our kids always put their feet up on the backs of our seats and I'm tired of them making the seats dirty. No point arguing about it. Better to get these and solve the problem. Kids like them. I like them. We don't put much in them, but I like that I can if I want to. We have a 2015 Hyundai Sonata and I think they fit the seats well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Price

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Storage
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, lots of storage. Will see how they hold up with the grandchildren on the next road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Partsch

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: These fit well on the back of seats Takes about 6 minuets to install
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids - easy to wipe down
customer_reviews.text: Love love these! Easy to wipe down. Love the cup Golfers for my kids! Easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Brendita

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty good product. Seems to be good quality and provides needed extra storage for kids in the backseat. The clear pocket for the tablets is touch sensitive, allowing my kids to navigate the tablet without taking it out. Very convenient! Great addition for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised and work perfectly to protect my seatbacks from my toddlers little feet!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4Runner, the kids watch the iPad on our road trips, use the cup holders and pockets for all their stuff - love these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little organizers
customer_reviews.text: My kids love all the storage these provide. They enjoy the clear pocket for holding their ipads also. I was a little disappointed to discover that the tissue holder is more like a bag and just hangs by a clip. I wish it actually could be secured to the organized so it didn't flop around and get bumped so much.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Mom with 3 kids
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must have for me with 3 kids in the car kept my car organized ( their toys and snacks) and clean
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Big bottom zipper compartment!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my box, my husband immediately said he wanted them :) looks like I’m placing another order—
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great quality.fits well on 2018 odyssey. good for kids and not having back of seat dirty.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to fit a Yukon SLT. It was not an easy fit and we struggled to get it on the seat. The cover for the tablet is not good. It was hot in the truck and we placed an iPad mini in it. The next day that part was stretched out and it sags. Unfortunately we will probably have to find a new backseat cover. I don’t think this one will list much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Taylor

product_meta.title: Oasser Kick Mats Car Seat Back Protectors Back of Seat Organizers 2 Pack XL with 1 Tissue Box Clear 10 inches Ipad Holder 3 Large Storage Organizers
feature_bullets: Additional gift： 2 pack Backseat Organizers. Extra tissue box which comes with the kick mats. The size of car seat back protectors is 9"x 5"x 2.5", 100% after service

Clear iPad holder - The organizer can hold up to 10" iPad. Moreover, it has Nylon Fasten Tape at both sides of the holder. You can open any side of the Nylon Fasten Tape to plug your earphone or the charger into your iPad

Multi- storages - Mesh bags at both sides to store drinks, power bank etc; zipped bottom pocket, which you can store books, magazines, snacks and etc; 2 plastic hooks to hang things like umbrellas and the tissue box (an additional gift)

Large Backseat Organizer - Size: 25.6” x 18.1”inch. It's large enough to cover the backs of the front seats very well. No more dirty shoe prints on the back of the seat. Suitable for most of cars and SUV. Easy to fit Easy to clean those dirty shoe prints on them, just need a wet cloth to clean it up. Fast and convenient
Durable material - The back seat protector uses strong 600D Oxford cloth, nylon (mesh bag), PVC (clear pocket) and waterproof frosted PVC (zipped bottom pocket)

specifications.Special Features:
Waterproof frosted PVC
, 10" Clear iPad holder
, Tissue box
, 2 pack kick mats
, Bottle mess bags
, Support-us@oasser.net
, Large zipped bottom pocket
